body: Clone works fine if set to true, but the the property `is_singleton` is false for this type, so a future use of is_singleton could be wrong. So either this field needs a more accurate name, or it the property needs to be set to false. Setting it to false would be easier for now.
body_html: Clone works fine if set to true, but the the property is_singleton is false for this type, so a future use of is_singleton could be wrong. So either this field needs a more accurate name, or it the property needs to be set to false. Setting it to false would be easier for now.
body_text: Clone works fine if set to true, but the the property is_singleton is false for this type, so a future use of is_singleton could be wrong. So either this field needs a more accurate name, or it the property needs to be set to false. Setting it to false would be easier for now.
